Name: Dragon Hunt
About the game: WHAT IS DRAGON HUNT? DRAGON HUNT is a classic bricks destroying game, where to win a level you need to destroy the so called dragon stones (yellow and red bricks) THE SETTING The world of Dragon Hunt is set in cyber space with 18 levels to complete. THE GAME You use arrow or WSAD keys to rotate the wheel and the game is very easy to learn. As you progress through the levels it will get harder and harder to master the game. FEATURES Classic brick destroying game Multiple types of stones (bricks) to destroy 18 levels to complete Easy to learn, hard to master with each level increasing difficulty and complexity
